channel.title: Please help me!
channel.description:
Online
Need help... (Again) « on: Today at 03:29:24 pm » Quote Modify Remove
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------- OK, I have DUC V.2.2.1 running, My source is running "Dizzlescape Online" ( I know not to "X" Out of them) I have jdk 6u12, I have Path and classpath set to my jdk version, I portforwarded to 43594 - 43594, i turned the firewall of...
Yet..... Dun.. Dun.. Dun... I can only connect by leaving the Ip Address section blank, or by filling in 127.0.0.1 I cannot play on the server by using my Ip address "Runningscape.no-ip.biz" (NOTE: ~I AM NOT ADVERTISING~.) What am I missing?
Help would be appreciated... I know my brain is obviously broke...
~Sincerly~ Microsoft1.

item.title: Please help me!
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

Is your computers local IP correct in your portforward page? This is what fixed it for me.

Read full topic
